version_description:
This is a maintenance release addressing various issues reported by the users.
Thanks a lot everyone for the feedback, much appreciated. The only way to make this app much better is with your help!

• Improved picture recognition with varying contrast
• Improved recognition of all the supported symbols
• Time-signature recognition; should not be confused with notes any more
• Export to MIDI fixed
• Help loading fixed in iOS 9
• Improved stability
• Note highlighting made smoother

If you enjoy using Sheet Music Scanner, please take a minute to leave a nice review; it really helps.

Thanks a lot everyone for sending your scores, thanks to you the app gets improved with every release!
If you enjoy using Sheet Music Scanner, please take a minute to leave a nice review; it really helps.

Updates:
- The ability to save recognised scores.
- Alto / viola clef recognition.
- Fixed audio crashing while playing.
- Added a warning about low memory after unexpected shutdown with a link how to make it work.
- Added a trombone sound.
- Replaced the piano sound with a clearer sound.
- Replaced General Midi program instructions so that the exported MIDI files open easily in GarageBand.

Recognition improvements:
- Beam - interrupted stems, merged beams, skewed beams.
- Accidentals, key signatures.
- Fix in multiple voices, when some of the staffs are completely empty without any rests.
- Close note heads timing.
- And other minor fixes.

Thanks a lot everyone for sending your scores and feedback, thanks to you the app gets improved with every release!
If you enjoy using Sheet Music Scanner, please take a minute to leave a nice review; it really helps.

Updates:
- Multi-page score support added.
- Viola & Double Bass sounds added.
- Flat pitch recognition improvement.
- Various minor fixes.

Thanks a lot everyone for sending your scores and feedback. Thanks to you the app gets improved with every release!
If you enjoy using Sheet Music Scanner, please take a minute to leave a nice review; it really helps.

Updates:
Import from cloud drives.
Supported formats:
- All the common image types, e.g. PNG, JPG, TIFF, etc.
- PDF files

Export:
- Audio (M4A / AAC)

Fixed MIDI channel assignments.
Improved memory management and stability for scores with multiple pages.
Bug fix - removed the Export to MusicXML button temporarily as it is not supported yet.
Bug fix - app was crashing when trying to access camera for the first time.

New features:
- Export to MusicXML. IMPORTANT: this only works for scores scanned with this version as it needs more information than the previous versions were able to recognize.
- Export to other apps either directly or via AirDrop
- Export of the selected voice

Big thanks to everyone for your feedback and suggestions!

Minor improvements:
• Fixed crashing in export to MusicXML in some cases
• Added alto sax and French horn

- Added a transposition slider (± 2 octaves) and the actual instrument pitch switch.
- Improved multi-page scores memory management; handles many more pages now. Tested with 75 pages.
- Accessibility update to button names to better support VoiceOver.

Many thanks everyone for sending your scores and feedback and helping make the app better with each release!
If you enjoy using Sheet Music Scanner, please take a minute to leave a nice review; it really helps.

Thanks a lot everyone for answers in the survey, for feedback and score samples. There will be another release in the upcoming months solely focusing on improving recognition.

Improvements:
- Export to PDF, MP3, and WAV added.
- MIDI channel assignment fixed to a channel per staff.
- Major staff line detection improvement in the cases when long beams overlap with lines.
- Perspective calculation improvement.
- Fixed tied notes with accidentals across multiple measures.
- Voice following across pages improved.
- Tempo range increased up to 330.
- New picture of the cat ;-)
Improved stability.

Updates:
- Improved clefs recognition.
- Improved bent staff ends detection.
- Fix in multiple voices detection.
- Fix in tied notes across measures.

New sounds: Harp, Percussive Organ, Reed Organ, Tonewheel Organ

Thanks everyone for score examples!
More recognition improvements to follow in the upcoming months.

This is a minor update to fix crashing when trying the app with pictures of bit-depth higher than 32. Thanks for reporting this!
There is also a big update on its way with various user interface improvements and also with new graphic design.
Improved recognition of treble clefs, flats, and half notes.

- Home Screen 3D Touch shortcuts added.
- Woodblock sound added.
- Improved compatibility with MuseScore and Finale, where note beams were not displayed.
- Improved recognition of accidentals and crotchet rests.
- Fixed an issue related to reading note heads close to each other.
- Improved VoiceOver support (Thanks to Helga!)

- Fixed the camera grid on iPhone XS Max and iPhone XR.
- Updated the Share dialogue​ to support more options.
- Improved recognition of adjoining whole notes.

The last selected speed is persisted now for the next scanned song.
Minor improvement in the alignment.
(More updates coming next month.)

- Improved recognition of note beams between two staffs.
- Improved recognition of half notes and whole notes.
- Fixed an issue with incorrectly recognized whole rests.
- Export to MusicXML fixed to handle special characters correctly.
- Minor convenience improvements and bug fixes.
Fixed an issue in the note beam detection that caused crashing in some cases. Big thanks to the people who reported it.

- Improved recognition of tied notes.
- Stability improvements.
Fix in the recognition of accidentals.
Bassoon sound added.
Stability improvements.
Improved recognition of bass clefs and flats.

- Support for landscape mode.
- Support for play/pause via Bluetooth.
- Fixes related to iOS 13.

- Fixed crashing when nothing is recognized or the resolution is too low.
- Fixed a bug in MP3 export with national characters in the file name.
Fixed import from email attachments.

- Translated the default name for a new song.
- Improvements to stability.

- The export workflow is simplified.
- Fix in semibreve recognition.
Fixed the recognition of 1/32nd rests.

- Improved flat and bass clef recognition.
- Fixed the navigation bar colors.
- Added Pizzicato Strings.
User interface and stability fixes for better compatibility with iOS 14.

Key signature recognition improved:
- Fixed note accidentals at the beginning of a new measure confused with key signatures in some cases.
- Change back to Cmaj/Ami in the middle of the staff handled correctly.
Improved time signature recognition.

- Ukulele sound added.
- Key signatures recognition improved.
- Minor bug fixes.
Treble clef recognition improved.
Key signature recognition improved.

Support for triplets and other tuplets.
Improved handling of parallel voices in MusicXML.
Improved highlighting.

Support for 64th notes and rests.
Bug fixes.

- Support for repeat signs and repeat endings
- Improved stability
- Minor fixes

Improved recognition of the repeat symbols.
Bug fixes.
